TEXT.English: Ah, [CT_NAME], one of the few colonial administrators who are almost my equal. What can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] do for you today?
TEXT.French: Ah, [CT_NAME], one of the few colonial administrators who are almost my equal. What can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] do for you today?
TEXT.German: Ah, [CT_NAME], one of the few colonial administrators who are almost my equal. What can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] do for you today?
TEXT.Italian: Ah, [CT_NAME], one of the few colonial administrators who are almost my equal. What can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] do for you today?
TEXT.Spanish: Ah, [CT_NAME], one of the few colonial administrators who are almost my equal. What can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] do for you today?

TEXT.English: Make it quick, [CT_NAME]. Running a mighty interstellar empire is hard work... not that you would understand that, of course.
TEXT.French: Make it quick, [CT_NAME]. Running a mighty interstellar empire is hard work... not that you would understand that, of course.
TEXT.German: Make it quick, [CT_NAME]. Running a mighty interstellar empire is hard work... not that you would understand that, of course.
TEXT.Italian: Make it quick, [CT_NAME]. Running a mighty interstellar empire is hard work... not that you would understand that, of course.
TEXT.Spanish: Make it quick, [CT_NAME]. Running a mighty interstellar empire is hard work... not that you would understand that, of course.

TEXT.English: [OUR_CT_NAME] does not negotiate with rebels.
TEXT.French: [OUR_CT_NAME] does not negotiate with rebels.
TEXT.German: [OUR_CT_NAME] does not negotiate with rebels.
TEXT.Italian: [OUR_CT_NAME] does not negotiate with rebels.
TEXT.Spanish: [OUR_CT_NAME] does not negotiate with rebels.

TEXT.English: The galaxy has suffered your insolence long enough, rebel scum!
TEXT.French: The galaxy has suffered your insolence long enough, rebel scum!
TEXT.German: The galaxy has suffered your insolence long enough, rebel scum!
TEXT.Italian: The galaxy has suffered your insolence long enough, rebel scum!
TEXT.Spanish: The galaxy has suffered your insolence long enough, rebel scum!

TEXT.English: Nothing personal, [CT_NAME], but it is time to unify the colonies under their rightful leader: me.
TEXT.French: Nothing personal, [CT_NAME], but it is time to unify the colonies under their rightful leader: me.
TEXT.German: Nothing personal, [CT_NAME], but it is time to unify the colonies under their rightful leader: me.
TEXT.Italian: Nothing personal, [CT_NAME], but it is time to unify the colonies under their rightful leader: me.
TEXT.Spanish: Nothing personal, [CT_NAME], but it is time to unify the colonies under their rightful leader: me.

TEXT.English: Always good talking to someone who understands the value of hard work. I'll be with you right away, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: Always good talking to someone who understands the value of hard work. I'll be with you right away, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: Always good talking to someone who understands the value of hard work. I'll be with you right away, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: Always good talking to someone who understands the value of hard work. I'll be with you right away, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: Always good talking to someone who understands the value of hard work. I'll be with you right away, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: This had better be important, I'm a very busy man.
TEXT.French: This had better be important, I'm a very busy man.
TEXT.German: This had better be important, I'm a very busy man.
TEXT.Italian: This had better be important, I'm a very busy man.
TEXT.Spanish: This had better be important, I'm a very busy man.

TEXT.English: I don't have time for some parasite like you.
TEXT.French: I don't have time for some parasite like you.
TEXT.German: I don't have time for some parasite like you.
TEXT.Italian: I don't have time for some parasite like you.
TEXT.Spanish: I don't have time for some parasite like you.

TEXT.English: Well, if it isn't our favorite repeat customer! What business do you have with the [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.French: Well, if it isn't our favorite repeat customer! What business do you have with the [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.German: Well, if it isn't our favorite repeat customer! What business do you have with the [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Italian: Well, if it isn't our favorite repeat customer! What business do you have with the [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Spanish: Well, if it isn't our favorite repeat customer! What business do you have with the [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Your brash mannerisms do not make you very welcome here, [CT_NAME]. State your business.
TEXT.French: Your brash mannerisms do not make you very welcome here, [CT_NAME]. State your business.
TEXT.German: Your brash mannerisms do not make you very welcome here, [CT_NAME]. State your business.
TEXT.Italian: Your brash mannerisms do not make you very welcome here, [CT_NAME]. State your business.
TEXT.Spanish: Your brash mannerisms do not make you very welcome here, [CT_NAME]. State your business.

TEXT.English: Talk to the invisible hand of the market, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.French: Talk to the invisible hand of the market, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.German: Talk to the invisible hand of the market, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Italian: Talk to the invisible hand of the market, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Spanish: Talk to the invisible hand of the market, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: Don't take this personally, but it seems your colonies would be more profitable to us if they were under our direct control.
TEXT.French: Don't take this personally, but it seems your colonies would be more profitable to us if they were under our direct control.
TEXT.German: Don't take this personally, but it seems your colonies would be more profitable to us if they were under our direct control.
TEXT.Italian: Don't take this personally, but it seems your colonies would be more profitable to us if they were under our direct control.
TEXT.Spanish: Don't take this personally, but it seems your colonies would be more profitable to us if they were under our direct control.

TEXT.English: My trusted friend [CT_NAME], I would so love to offer you a cup of tea, but alas, we are separated by several hundred lightyears. Anyway, how may [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you?
TEXT.French: My trusted friend [CT_NAME], I would so love to offer you a cup of tea, but alas, we are separated by several hundred lightyears. Anyway, how may [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you?
TEXT.German: My trusted friend [CT_NAME], I would so love to offer you a cup of tea, but alas, we are separated by several hundred lightyears. Anyway, how may [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you?
TEXT.Italian: My trusted friend [CT_NAME], I would so love to offer you a cup of tea, but alas, we are separated by several hundred lightyears. Anyway, how may [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you?
TEXT.Spanish: My trusted friend [CT_NAME], I would so love to offer you a cup of tea, but alas, we are separated by several hundred lightyears. Anyway, how may [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you?

TEXT.English: The luxuries of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] await you. Come and relax in our resorts while we discuss interstellar politics.
TEXT.French: The luxuries of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] await you. Come and relax in our resorts while we discuss interstellar politics.
TEXT.German: The luxuries of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] await you. Come and relax in our resorts while we discuss interstellar politics.
TEXT.Italian: The luxuries of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] await you. Come and relax in our resorts while we discuss interstellar politics.
TEXT.Spanish: The luxuries of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] await you. Come and relax in our resorts while we discuss interstellar politics.

TEXT.English: Your presence disturbs [OUR_CIV_SHORT], but perhaps you have something that will lighten my mood?
TEXT.French: Your presence disturbs [OUR_CIV_SHORT], but perhaps you have something that will lighten my mood?
TEXT.German: Your presence disturbs [OUR_CIV_SHORT], but perhaps you have something that will lighten my mood?
TEXT.Italian: Your presence disturbs [OUR_CIV_SHORT], but perhaps you have something that will lighten my mood?
TEXT.Spanish: Your presence disturbs [OUR_CIV_SHORT], but perhaps you have something that will lighten my mood?

TEXT.English: Careful, [CT_NAME]. [OUR_CIV_SHORT] has warships within attack range of your colonies. Talk fast, before I decide to use them.
TEXT.French: Careful, [CT_NAME]. [OUR_CIV_SHORT] has warships within attack range of your colonies. Talk fast, before I decide to use them.
TEXT.German: Careful, [CT_NAME]. [OUR_CIV_SHORT] has warships within attack range of your colonies. Talk fast, before I decide to use them.
TEXT.Italian: Careful, [CT_NAME]. [OUR_CIV_SHORT] has warships within attack range of your colonies. Talk fast, before I decide to use them.
TEXT.Spanish: Careful, [CT_NAME]. [OUR_CIV_SHORT] has warships within attack range of your colonies. Talk fast, before I decide to use them.

TEXT.English: You're just not worth my time, [CT_NAME]. Come back when you have something of value.
TEXT.French: You're just not worth my time, [CT_NAME]. Come back when you have something of value.
TEXT.German: You're just not worth my time, [CT_NAME]. Come back when you have something of value.
TEXT.Italian: You're just not worth my time, [CT_NAME]. Come back when you have something of value.
TEXT.Spanish: You're just not worth my time, [CT_NAME]. Come back when you have something of value.

TEXT.English: I think it's time to step up my game from entrepeneur to emperor, starting with your colonies.
TEXT.French: I think it's time to step up my game from entrepeneur to emperor, starting with your colonies.
TEXT.German: I think it's time to step up my game from entrepeneur to emperor, starting with your colonies.
TEXT.Italian: I think it's time to step up my game from entrepeneur to emperor, starting with your colonies.
TEXT.Spanish: I think it's time to step up my game from entrepeneur to emperor, starting with your colonies.

TEXT.English: Welcome! How can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you in the fight against tyranny and the remains of the old order?
TEXT.French: Welcome! How can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you in the fight against tyranny and the remains of the old order?
TEXT.German: Welcome! How can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you in the fight against tyranny and the remains of the old order?
TEXT.Italian: Welcome! How can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you in the fight against tyranny and the remains of the old order?
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome! How can [OUR_CIV_SHORT] help you in the fight against tyranny and the remains of the old order?

TEXT.English: You've proven yourself nothing but a puppet of the old regime. What do you have to say for yourself, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.French: You've proven yourself nothing but a puppet of the old regime. What do you have to say for yourself, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.German: You've proven yourself nothing but a puppet of the old regime. What do you have to say for yourself, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Italian: You've proven yourself nothing but a puppet of the old regime. What do you have to say for yourself, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Spanish: You've proven yourself nothing but a puppet of the old regime. What do you have to say for yourself, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Your imperialist lies do not deceive me, [CT_NAME]! Begone!
TEXT.French: Your imperialist lies do not deceive me, [CT_NAME]! Begone!
TEXT.German: Your imperialist lies do not deceive me, [CT_NAME]! Begone!
TEXT.Italian: Your imperialist lies do not deceive me, [CT_NAME]! Begone!
TEXT.Spanish: Your imperialist lies do not deceive me, [CT_NAME]! Begone!

TEXT.English: Sic semper tyrannis!
TEXT.French: Sic semper tyrannis!
TEXT.German: Sic semper tyrannis!
TEXT.Italian: Sic semper tyrannis!
TEXT.Spanish: Sic semper tyrannis!

TEXT.English: I'm in the middle of an important experiment, so make this quick.
TEXT.French: I'm in the middle of an important experiment, so make this quick.
TEXT.German: I'm in the middle of an important experiment, so make this quick.
TEXT.Italian: I'm in the middle of an important experiment, so make this quick.
TEXT.Spanish: I'm in the middle of an important experiment, so make this quick.

TEXT.English: I have lab rats with more interesting things to say than you.
TEXT.French: I have lab rats with more interesting things to say than you.
TEXT.German: I have lab rats with more interesting things to say than you.
TEXT.Italian: I have lab rats with more interesting things to say than you.
TEXT.Spanish: I have lab rats with more interesting things to say than you.

TEXT.English: Every second I spend talking to you is a second wasted, so please hurry up.
TEXT.French: Every second I spend talking to you is a second wasted, so please hurry up.
TEXT.German: Every second I spend talking to you is a second wasted, so please hurry up.
TEXT.Italian: Every second I spend talking to you is a second wasted, so please hurry up.
TEXT.Spanish: Every second I spend talking to you is a second wasted, so please hurry up.
